nominations.disabledEmptyMapgroup: {green}>> {default}Nomination disabled because there are no maps in the active map group!
nominations.beMoreSpecific: {green}>> {default}You need to specify a map name or a part of a map name that uniquely identifies the map!
nominations.chatMenuTitle: {green}>> {default}Nominate a map for vote at match end:
nominations.noMapFound: {green}>> {default}No map was found that starts with or contains your query. Please try again!
nominations.couldNotIdentify: {green}>> {default}Could not uniquely identify the map you want. Did you mean one of the following maps?
nominations.noNominationsYet: {green}[Nominations] {default}No nominations so far. Type in {lime}!nom <map-name>{default} to nominate a map for voting after match end!
nominations.nominationByPlayerSuccessful: {green}[Nominations] {default}Player {lime}{player}{default} nominated map {lime}{map}{default} for the map vote at match end!
nominations.nominationByUnknownEntitySuc: {green}[Nominations] {default}Map {lime}{map}{default} was nominated for the map vote at match end!
callVotes.disabledManually: {yellow}>> {default}Callvotes disabled at the moment! Consider to nominate a map and start an {lime}!rtv{default} vote instead.
callVotes.disabledEmptyMapgroup: {yellow}>> {default}Callvotes disabled because there are no maps in the active map group!
callVotes.beMoreSpecific: {yellow}>> {default}You need to specify a map name or a part of a map name that uniquely identifies the map!
callVotes.noMapFound: {yellow}>> {default}No map was found that starts with or contains your query. Please try again!
callVotes.couldNotIdentify: {yellow}>> {default}Could not uniquely identify the map you want. Did you mean one of the following maps?
callVotes.activeCooldown: {yellow}>> {default}The next callvote can be started in {lime}{seconds}{default} seconds!
callVotes.voteStartedByPlayer: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}Player {lime}{player}{default} started an callvote to change the map to {lime}{map}{default}. Type in {lime}!cv{default} if you want this map too!
callVotes.voteStartedByUnknownEntity: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}A callvote to change the map to {lime}{map}{default} was started. Type in {lime}!cv{default} if you want this map too!
callVotes.alreadySucceeded: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}A previous callvote already succeeded. Changing map to {lime}{map}{default} after this round!
callVotes.voteSucceeded: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}Vote succeeded. Changing map to {lime}{map}{default} after this round!
callVotes.voteFailed: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}Vote failed. Only {lime}{playersVoted}{default} of {lime}{playersNeeded}{default} players voted, so not changing map!
callVotes.status: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}Vote in progress - {lime}{playersVoted}{default} of {lime}{playersNeeded}{default} needed players voted for changing the map to {lime}{map}{default}!
callVotes.statusHint: {yellow}[CallVote] {default}Type in {lime}!cv{default} to vote for this map too!
rtv.activeCooldown: {lightblue}>> {default}The next RTV can be started in {lime}{seconds}{default} seconds!
rtv.voteStartedByPlayer: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}Player {lime}{player}{default} started an RTV vote. Type in {lime}!rtv{default} if you want to change the map!
rtv.voteStartedByUnknownEntity: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}An RTV vote was started. Type in {lime}!rtv{default} if you want to change the map!
rtv.alreadySucceeded: {lightblue}>> {default}A previous RTV vote was already successful, and the map will be changed after this round!
rtv.voteSucceeded: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}Vote succeeded. Changing map after this round!
rtv.voteFailed: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}Vote failed. Only {lime}{playersVoted}{default} of {lime}{playersNeeded}{default} players voted, so not changing map!
rtv.status: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}Vote in progress - {lime}{playersVoted}{default} of {lime}{playersNeeded}{default} needed players voted for changing the map!
rtv.statusHint: {lightblue}[RTV] {default}Type in {lime}!rtv{default} to vote. Remember to {lime}!nominate{default} maps for the map vote!
